content.title: Creative. Culture. Community.
content.content: We’re a collective of professional rebels – CHOREOGRAPHERS, DESIGNERS, DANCERS, DIRECTORS, MANAGERS, TECHNICIANS –  who craft cosmic artistic experiences.
content.categories: ART DIRECTING, CONCEPT CREATION, EVENTS, CHOREOGRAPHIES, PROMO/MUSIC VIDEOS, CONCERTS

gist1.title: Creative = the gist
gist1.content: A term, perhaps, of dubious originality, but the act is like no other. The flow of bold ideas that lead us to that captivating pulse of novelty and cool experience.

gist2.title: Culture = the love
gist2.content: Independent culture opens the space for change and a deeper sense of the world and society around. And we f*cking love it.

gist3.title: Community = the form
gist3.content: Our basic instinct is to be together. Wake up the potential and spark the talent among each other. Community gives space for creating magic across disciplines.
